title: Attempting to recconect
body:
Copy pasted this here (cuz it does not belong in bugs)
So....i am in low priority...AGAIN....20 MINUTES.....even tho i played about 4 months without afk. (i am probably missing something here)

Now on to the bug,i was casualy playing ranked,then my internet died for about 5 minutes (thanks useless net company)
When the connection came back,the ping just kept going on and on between 400 and 500 for another 2
minutes which by the time i shut down the game and re-entered,lost us the baron and the game+gave me a lp queue.

(Share da lovin of Valentines and remove my lp :") ) P.S. Considering the amount of internet bugs i posted here (only bugs i ever posted) you should promote me into : "Senior Officer of Internet Bug Reports and Grandmaster of croatian net company induced Low Priority Queues"

replies.body:
Unfortunately, I cannot modify or remove your penalties as a result of your disconnection. The system was designed this way to prevent abuse.

Have you reached out to your ISP regarding the disconnections you've been having with their network?

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=7OXmEzZe,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-02-15T02:57:27.544+0000)
>
> Unfortunately, I cannot modify or remove your penalties as a result of your disconnection. The system was designed this way to prevent abuse.
> 
> Have you reached out to your ISP regarding the disconnections you've been having with their network?

Yo Targon,i think you're missing the point,even when my internet connection came back,i could not reconnect because the ping just would not go below 400,im not claiming that  thats Riots Vault,but...is it?

What about the title tho? ;)

Also,thanks for your help

Ah, you mentioned your internet died for a few minutes, so I figured you meant you were losing connection at your modem. I found no recorded server issues on EUNE recently. Have you ensured your network settings are [**properly configured for League**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)? You may have an incompatible network setting causing a conflict with your ability to maintain a connection.

If you see further issues, let me know so we can troubleshoot further.

You may have an incompatible network setting causing a conflict with your ability to maintain a connection.
> 
> If you see further issues, let me know so we can troubleshoot further.

Apologies for the delay,was busy with school and stuff.
I feel like i've been a little vague with my explanation+its kind of in a wall of text(my bad) so i will recount everything

1.My internet dies which is  what you first had in mind,i lost connection to the modem(my country doesn't have a very good internet so it sometimes crashes,but that is not the point here). 

2.The connection came back after about 7-10 minutes perfectly fine,full speed and all.

3.I stood there for about 2 minutes watching the ping go between 400-500 ms(package loss maybe cuz of the long disconnect?),sometimes the "attempting to reconnect" popup would dissapear and come right back,and once or twice i saw (and heard) "an ally has been slain" "an enemy has been slain"

4.In the end i had to just shut down the game and reconnect that way.(which made me reconnect late)

Hope this will make it a little bit more clear,and once again thanks for sticking through my sometimes whiny posts.

Note : what most interests me in this discussion is point 3,the ms not stabilizing,rather refusing to go below 400 despite my internet being perfectly fine at that moment

Gotcha, yeah, so it sounds like there's definitely either some issues with your network hardware and/or network settings. Work through the steps that I linked in my last reply and if you still encounter issues, we can run a traceroute to look at your path to the servers. ^.^
